content: now wider and *decrease row* which will maintain the width until you close up the afghan with the last square after finishing last square - chain 3 turn and slip_stitch around chain 3 post of previous row this will even out the sides of the afghan sample this stitch looks so pretty in variegated yarns too i hope this little tutorial has been of some help however i can t anticipate every problem you may personally encounter with this stitch i had the good fortune of having a live person teach me the stitch - and i know how difficult it can be to crochet from a written pattern
